Initial commit: SQLite Manager with full features

Features implemented:
- Database management (open/create/browse)
- Table management (create/delete/export)
- Data viewing with pagination, search, and sorting
- Excel upload with multi-sheet support
- Modern shadcn/ui inspired dark/light theme
- Context menus and modal dialogs

Components:
- Main window with sidebar navigation
- Database selector with recent databases
- Table list with TreeView
- Table browser with search/sort/pagination
- Table creator with schema designer
- Excel uploader with progress tracking

Tech stack:
- Python + CustomTkinter
- SQLite + pandas + openpyxl
- Minimal overhead (~30MB, ~0.5s startup)
